name: VerticalDivider
desc: A thin vertical line, with padding on either side.

fields.name: thickness
fields.desc: The thickness of the line drawn within the divider.

fields.name: indent
fields.desc: The amount of empty space on top of the divider.

fields.name: endIndent
fields.desc: The amount of empty space under the divider.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color to use when painting the line.

fields.name: radius
fields.desc: The amount of radius for the border of the divider.
